page.title: AT T, Vonage Cut Prices on Internet Calling
page.text: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - AT T Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=T.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">T.N</A> and Internet telephone provider Vonage on Thursday said they were cutting prices for their residential Internet calling services by \$5 per month, the strongest signs yet of a price war in the nascent market.
